Class DocumentService

java.lang.Object
spss.project.backend.document.DocumentService
@Service public class DocumentService extends Object
A service for working with documents. This service provides methods for saving, retrieving, and deleting documents from the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor

    This is the constructor of the DocumentService class.

  • Method Details

    • saveDocument

      public void saveDocument(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, String studentId) throws org.springframework.dao.DuplicateKeyException, Exception
      Saves a document to the database, given a MultipartFile and a student ID.
      Parameters:
      file - the document to be saved
      studentId - the ID of the student to save the document for
      Throws:
      Exception - if the document cannot be saved
      org.springframework.dao.DuplicateKeyException

    • deleteDocument

      public void deleteDocument(String studentId, String fileName) throws Exception
      Deletes a document from the database, given a student ID and the name of the document.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      fileName - the name of the document
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong

    • getDocument

      public byte[] getDocument(String studentId, String fileName) throws org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException, Exception
      Retrieves a document from the database, given a student ID and the name of the document.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      fileName - the name of the document
      Returns:
      the document as a byte array
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException - if the document cannot be found
      Exception - if the document cannot be found

    • convertToGridFsFileName

      public String convertToGridFsFileName(String fileName, String studentId)
      Converts a file name and student ID into a combined file path.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file
      studentId - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      a string representing the file path in the format "studentId/fileName"

    • extractFileName

      public String extractFileName(String gridFsFileName)
      Extracts the name of the file from a combined file path.
      Parameters:
      gridFsFileName - the combined file path
      Returns:
      the name of the file

    • extractStudentId

      public String extractStudentId(String gridFsFileName)
      Extracts the student ID from a combined file path.
      Parameters:
      gridFsFileName - the combined file path in the format "studentId/fileName"
      Returns:
      the student ID

    • getDocuments

      public com.mongodb.client.MongoCursor<com.mongodb.client.gridfs.model.GridFSFile> getDocuments(String studentId) throws Exception
      Finds all documents for the given student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      a cursor over the documents
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong
